howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get professional listings in three simple steps

step1.title: Install Extension
step1.description: Add the Vinted generator to your browser in seconds. It's free to get started.

step2.title: Click to Generate
step2.description: On any Vinted listing page, click the Generate button to instantly generate professional content.

step3.title: Publish & Sell
step3.description: Review, customize if needed, and publish your optimized listing. Watch your sales improve!

free.name: Free Trial

features: See if you like it first

q1.question: How do the usage limits work?
q1.answer: Each plan has daily and monthly limits. If you hit your daily limit, you can still use any remaining monthly capacity the next day. Limits reset automatically.

q2.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q2.answer: Yes! All paid plans can be cancelled at any time. You'll keep access until the end of your current billing period.

q3.question: What if I need more than 75 listings per day?
q3.answer: Contact us for custom enterprise pricing. We can accommodate high-volume sellers with custom limits.

footer.freeExplanation: Free trial gives you just enough to see the magic ✨. Most sellers need more than 2 listings/day, making paid plans excellent value.
footer.pricingNote: All prices in EUR. Cancel anytime. No setup fees.
